The couple separated in 1998 and formally divorced on June 2000. On New Year's Eve 2001, Prince married Manuela Testolini, a former Paisley Park employee in a hush-hush ceremony.

360 pages on this wiki. No, he does not. Though married twice, Prince does not have any children. His first wife, Mayte, did get pregnant but sadly gave birth to a child with severe birth defects (Pfeiffer's syndrome). It did not live long. Categories :

Prince Edward has two children with his spouse Sophie, Countess of  Wessex. Their names are Lady Louise Windsor and James, Viscount  Severn.

The existence of royal love children is an interesting subject. Although history is littered with examples, only two children fathered by living royals have been officially acknowledged in recent times: Prince Albert of Monaco has admitted that he is the father of Jazmin Grace Grimaldi and Alexandre Coste.
